title: Frontend Mentor Challenge - Space Tourism Multi-Page Website
description: A captivating project from Frontend Mentor, where I developed a multi-page website for space tourism, meticulously adhering to the provided design specifications to deliver a visually stunning and functional experience.

title: Frontend Mentor Challenge - URL Shortening API Landing Page
description: This project involved creating a responsive and user-friendly landing page integrated with a URL Shortener API, showcasing my ability to handle API interactions and deliver seamless user experiences.

title: Frontend Mentor Challenge - REST Countries API with Color Theme Switcher
description: A comprehensive challenge where I built a website utilizing the REST Countries API. The project features a functional search for countries and a dynamic color theme switcher, demonstrating my proficiency in API integration and responsive design.
